ygData.messageBody:
>I think the reagent should be a musical instrument ;) But that's just me.
>Of course, I've been arguing long for giving NPCs bind-for-plat :P

Now this is an interesting idea! You could make a Special instrument that is
a container, have it require 1 or more reagents, when the bard hits combine
it becomes with one charge of bind, of course the instrument would be no
drop no trade. When the bard starts singing his song, he can right click it
and complete the bind. It could still cause exp loss, and the song sould
still be unusable for 2 days afterword. Interesting..
